body:
Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) shares are trading +1.06% thus far today and have traded in the range of 39.75 – 40.20 during the current session. In order to take a look at where the stock might headed longer term, we can also look at different sets of data. Sell-side research firms currently have a consensus one year price target of $43.50 on the stock according to First Call. This number can often vary from the Zacks or FactSet mean targets. The sell-side analysts are projecting earnings per share of $0.78 for the next fiscal quarter. For the current year, analysts are predicting earnings of $2.56 per share according to First Call.

In looking at where the stock is trading on a technical level, the stock is trading +1.99% away from its 50 day moving average of $39.32. Based on the most recent available data, the equity is -4.52% off of its 52-week high of $42.00 and +17.53% away from its 52-week low which is $34.12. In taking a look at the company’s valuation, the firm’s price to earnings ratio stands at 19.14. This is a crucial indicator investors watch as higher ratios compared to peers, would suggest higher future earnings growth potential for the stock. The price to current year EPS estimates from research analysts currently stands at 15.66. In looking further ahead, potential investors should note that the company’s price to next year’s EPS estimates is 14.32.

Today, the stock opened at $39.85 and the last bid at the time of writing stood at $40.10. During the session thus far, the equity dipped down to $39.75 and touched $40.20 as the high point. Oracle Corporation Common Stock has a market cap of 164.50B and has seen an average daily volume of 13057700 over the past three months.

Wall Street sell-side research analysts covering Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ:EA) shares have recently provided various price target projections on where the stock might be going. According to them, the stock is expected to reach $90.816 on a consensus level within the next year, according to Zacks. The most bullish estimate sees the stock reaching $105 while the most conservative estimate stand at $64.

Zacks also gives an average broker rating based on the sell-side recommendations from the analysts who cover Electronic Arts Inc.. They give the company shares an ABR of 1.84. This is based on the 15 analysts taken into consideration by Zacks.

Currently, Wall Street is projecting that the firm will post $2.15 earnings per share. This consensus number is also derived from Zacks. For the most recent period which ended on 2016-09-30, Electronic Arts Inc.'s EPS was reported as $0.43. This created a “surprise factor” 48.28% due to being $0.14 apart from what Wall Street predicted. When actual numbers differ greatly from the consensus expectations, sharp movement in the stock price can often be seen in the hours or days following the report.

Investors will mark their calendars for 2017-01-31, the date when Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ:EA) are expected to release their quarterly results.
title: Sell-Side Researchers Offering Their Take on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL), Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ:EA)
